items.title: Salah involved in Liverpool training after outburst
items.description: Mohamed Salah takes part in Liverpool's training session on Monday following his explosive interview at the weekend.

items.title: 50,000 new apprenticeships promised in youth employment push
items.description: Funding will be used to help employ young people in sectors including AI, hospitality and engineering.

items.title: DJ Tim Westwood pleads not guilty to rape and assault
items.description: The former BBC Radio 1 and Capital Xtra presenter denies 15 charges at a court hearing in London.

items.title: One hundred abducted schoolchildren released in Nigeria
items.description: Details of the release of the schoolchildren are still unclear and 165 people remain unaccounted for.

items.title: Thousands flee Thai-Cambodia border after deadly clashes
items.description: At least five people have been killed in the most serious confrontation between both sides since July.
